data.lyric:
[ti:Ride It]
[ar:Regard]
[al:Ride It]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ride It - Regard
[00:01.13]Lyrics by：Jay Sean/Alan Sampson
[00:02.26]Composed by：Jay Sean/Alan Sampson
[00:03.39]Ride it ride it come touch my soul
[00:06.34]Ride it ride let me feel you
[00:08.47]Ride it turn the lights down low
[00:10.58]Ride it from head to tow
[00:12.44]Ride it ride it touch my soul
[00:14.47]Ride it ride let me feel you
[00:16.39]It's been a month and twenty days
[00:17.86]And we're doing 'round and 'round just playing silly games
[00:20.04]Now you're saying slow it down not right now
[00:22.59]Then ya wink at me and walk away
[00:24.53]Let it be let it be let it be known
[00:26.63]Hold on don't go
[00:28.64]Touching and teasing me telling me no
[00:30.73]But this time I need to feel you
[00:32.84]Ride it we're all alone
[00:34.72]Ride it just lose control
[00:36.66]Ride it ride it come touch my soul
[00:38.85]Ride it ride let me feel you
[00:40.88]Ride it turn the lights down low
[00:42.82]Ride it from head to tow
[00:44.84]Ride it ride it touch my soul
[00:46.87]Ride it ride let me feel you feel you
[01:05.19]Vida was the club on the Saturday
[01:06.70]Ya actin' like a diva sayin' you don't wanna pay
[01:08.75]It's gotta be ya fiesty style raised eyebrow
[01:11.40]I love it when you look at me that way
[01:12.81]Now we're in you order a mojito at the bar
[01:14.94]You re-apply lippy 'cause it came off on the glass
[01:16.94]The DJ plays your favourite songs Kanye's on
[01:19.61]Now ya beckoning for me to dance
[01:21.08]Mm pullin' me pullin' me pullin' me close
[01:23.54]Just close your eyes girl
[01:25.60]Whispering tellin' me we gotta go
[01:28.01]Won't you take me home I want to ride it
[01:30.26]We're all alone
[01:31.66]Ride it just lose control
[01:33.74]Ride it ride it come touch my soul
[01:35.86]Ride it ride let me feel you
[01:37.88]Ride it turn the lights down low
[01:39.97]Ride it from head to tow
[01:41.89]Ride it ride it touch my soul
[01:44.04]Ride it ride let me feel you
[01:45.99]Ride it we're all alone
[01:47.91]Ride it just lose control
[01:50.02]Ride it ride it come touch my soul
[01:52.21]Ride it ride let me feel you
[01:54.12]Ride it turn the lights down low
[01:56.20]Ride it from head to tow
[01:58.13]Ride it ride it touch my soul
[02:00.07]Ride it ride let me feel you feel you feel you
[02:16.90]Take me full know
[02:18.45]Ride it we're all alone
[02:20.48]Ride it just lose control
[02:22.51]Ride it ride it come touch my soul
[02:24.63]Ride it ride let me feel you
[02:26.66]Ride it turn the lights down low
[02:28.71]Ride it from head to tow
[02:30.63]Ride it ride it touch my soul
[02:32.80]Ride it ride let me feel you
data.trans:
[ti:Ride It]
[ar:Regard]
[al:Ride It]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.13]//
[00:02.26]//
[00:03.39]尽情狂欢吧 来感知我的灵魂
[00:06.34]尽情狂欢吧 让我感受你的气息
[00:08.47]尽情狂欢吧 将灯光都调暗一点
[00:10.58]尽情狂欢吧 从头到脚地释放吧
[00:12.44]尽情狂欢吧 来感知我的灵魂
[00:14.47]尽情狂欢吧 让我感受你的气息
[00:16.39]时间已经过去一个月零二十天
[00:17.86]而我们不停做着这愚蠢的游戏
[00:20.04]现在你却说慢慢来 现在还不着急
[00:22.59]你对我抛了个媚眼 然后转身离去
[00:24.53]时机成熟 就是现在
[00:26.63]等等 不要走
[00:28.64]和我温存嬉笑 耳鬓厮磨
[00:30.73]这一次我需要拥有你
[00:32.84]尽情狂欢吧 反正我们都孤独
[00:34.72]尽情狂欢吧 就这样失去控制
[00:36.66]尽情狂欢吧 来感知我的灵魂
[00:38.85]尽情狂欢吧 让我感受你的气息
[00:40.88]尽情狂欢吧 将灯光都调暗一点

[01:05.19]我们周六去了Vida俱乐部
[01:06.70]你表现得像个女王 不愿付账
[01:08.75]确实是你的风格 轻轻挑眉
[01:11.40]我喜欢你看着我的眼神
[01:12.81]我们走进吧台 你点了杯莫吉托
[01:14.94]口红已掉色 所以你补了补妆
[01:16.94]DJ播放你最爱的歌曲 Kanye的音乐响起
[01:19.61]现在你向我招手 想和我跳舞
[01:21.08]靠近我 靠近我 快向我靠近一点
[01:23.54]女孩 请闭上你的双眼
[01:25.60]你对我轻声低语 说是时候离开
[01:28.01]快送我回家吧 我想要尽情狂欢
[01:30.26]尽情狂欢吧 反正我们都孤独
[01:31.66]尽情狂欢吧 就这样失去控制
[01:33.74]尽情狂欢吧 来感知我的灵魂
